name: Solitaire Classic ◆
description:
The best CLASSIC Solitaire! Polished, intuitive, and fun!

- 40 beautiful HD themes to customize your look.
- Over 50,000 winnable games.
- Draw one or draw three gameplay.
- Easy to play.
- No fluff, no confusing menus, just good old classic Solitaire.
- Auto-move or manual drag & drop controls.
- Landscape and portrait orientation.
- Left or right handed play.
- Universal iPhone and iPad support.
- Free updates including more theme packs.
- Slick interface and animations.
- Statistics tracking.

Don't take our word for it, see what our awesome users have to say!

"This his been an old favorite of mine for a long time. Great Solitaire."

"The themes provide something for everyone."

"Love it! Five stars!"

"The best Solitaire"

Please be sure to check out other apps by Banana & Co. including Spider Solitaire & FreeCell.

Thanks for playing!
